definition: "fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
to be familiar with/to know well
what's frequently heard can be repeated in detail (idiom)
Changshu county level city in Suzhou 蘇州|苏州[Su1 zhou1], Jiangsu
to be well acquainted with/to know well
to pay no attention to a familiar sight/to ignore
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back

sentences.english: he was skilful at sketching. Suddenly, Abe suggested to go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 他素描畫得很嫺熟，突然，艾貝提議去滑雪。

sentences.english: The loquat in the yard has got ripe gradually.
sentences.chinese: 院子裏的枇杷漸次熟了。

sentences.english: Recommendations with red meat, grilled and cooked cheese.
sentences.chinese: 建議搭配紅肉，燒烤和熟奶酪飲用。

sentences.english: He is thoroughly drilled in English grammar.
sentences.chinese: 他的英語語法練得很熟。

sentences.english: You dip the meat and vegetables in the broth and turn them around several times until they are done.
sentences.chinese: 把肉和蔬菜放在鍋裏涮直到熟爲止就可以吃了。

sentences.english: I asked Chen Shichu about his secret recipe on bun-making, when we got familiar with each other.
sentences.chinese: 筆者和陳世初熟之後，問他做包子的祕訣。

sentences.english: While cooking, adding a ripe banana also helps.
sentences.chinese: 烹飪時，加入一根熟香蕉也是有用的。

sentences.english: I drank a couple of brandies before going to bed and slept like a log.
sentences.chinese: 我上牀前喝了幾杯白蘭地酒，因此就睡得很熟。

sentences.english: Blanch all vegetables and set aside.
sentences.chinese: 所有的蔬菜粒焯熟，備用。

sentences.english: Nicks in the years was well acquainted each other in the eyes of Yun volatile.
sentences.chinese: 歲月的刻痕可以在相互稔熟的目光中隕化揮發。

sentences.english: As they often play football together, they have got to know each other quite well.
sentences.chinese: 他們常在一起踢足球，一來二去地也就熟了。

sentences.english: Begin checking the fish for doneness after 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 約10分鐘後，檢查魚肉熟的程度。

sentences.english: When the wheat is headed it is reaped and threshed .
sentences.chinese: 麥子熟了，就把它收割脫粒了。

sentences.english: Heat some oil in pan, pan-fry the veal in parma ham until color changed.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔肉及巴馬火腿下鍋用橄欖油煎香，顏色轉深即熟。

sentences.english: He was fast asleep with his mouth wide open.
sentences.chinese: 他睡得很熟，嘴巴大大地張開着。

definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)
